original: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, na dukkhaṁ. Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhañceva dukkhasaccañca.
analyzed: kāyikam dukkham cetasikam dukkham ṭhapetvā avasesam dukkha sacca na dukkha kāyikam dukkham cetasikam dukkham dukkham ca iva dukkha saccam ca

original: Samudayasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso samudayo, na samudayasaccaṁ. Samudayasaccaṁ samudayo ceva samudayasaccañca.
analyzed: samudaya saccam ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ samudayaḥ na samudaya sacca samudaya saccam samudayaḥ ca iva samudaya saccam ca

original: Nirodhasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso nirodho, na nirodhasaccaṁ. Nirodhasaccaṁ nirodho ceva nirodhasaccañca.
analyzed: nirodha saccam ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ nirodhaḥ na nirodha sacca nirodha saccam nirodhaḥ ca iva nirodha saccañca

original: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso maggo, na maggasaccaṁ. Maggasaccaṁ maggo ceva maggasaccañca.
analyzed: magga saccam ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ maggaḥ na magga sacca magga saccam maggaḥ ca iva magga saccañca

original: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ. Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
analyzed: kāyikam dukkham cetasikam dukkham ṭhapetvā avasesam na dukkham dukkha sadda dukkham ca dukkha saccam ca ṭhapetvā avasesam na ca iva dukkham na ca dukkha saccam
na dukkha saccam na dukkhanti āmantā

original: Samudayasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na samudayasaccaṁ, samudayo. Samudayañca samudayasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva samudayo na ca samudayasaccaṁ.
analyzed: samudaya saccam ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ na samudaya sad ca samudayaḥ samudayam ca samudaya saccam ca ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ na ca iva samudayaḥ na ca samudaya sad ca

original: Nirodhasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodho. Nirodhañca nirodhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva nirodho na ca nirodhasaccaṁ.
analyzed: nirodha saccam ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ na nirodha sat ca nirodhaḥ nirodham ca nirodha saccam ca ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ na ca iva nirodhaḥ na ca nirodha sacca
na magga saccam na maggo ti

original: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na maggasaccaṁ, maggo. Maggañca maggasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva maggo na ca maggasaccaṁ.
analyzed: magga saccam ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ na magga sacca maggaḥ maggam ca magga saccam ca ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ na ca iva maggaḥ na ca magga sacca

original: Samudayasaccaṁ saccañceva samudayasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na samudayasaccaṁ.
